title: Test Day, Team Player
features: Heartwarming story of one Elementary school teacher's solution to reduce test anxiety for her students; a strategy that can be used in any classroom. Appropriate read aloud for all grade levels.
description: Shannon Moore Fitzgerald is a former elementary school teacher, author, artist, quilter, and lover of learning. She is also the author and illustrator of Halloween Night; a fun picture book of Halloween. She lives in Hillsborough North Carolina with her amazingly supportive husband, uniquely radiant daughter, and spare rooms for her sons to come home to.
store: Shannon Moore Fitzgerald (Author),  Danielle Natalie Losos (Illustrator)

author: {'avatar': 'https://m.media-amazon.com/images/S/amzn-author-media-prod/7p3eesl65vntn2sdj42mtij3km._SY600_.jpg', 'name': 'Shannon Moore Fitzgerald', 'about': ['Shannon Moore Fitzgerald is a creative explorer. She loves creating high vibrational intuitive paintings, creating unique original mixed media artwork, writing and illustrating books, and making light and emotion filled photographs. Being a former Elementary School teacher and child care provider she enjoys visiting schools and groups to share her books as well as her passion for writing and creating with students. . Shannon is also the author and illustrator of "Halloween Night", and "Thanksgiving Weekend", "Halloween Night La Noche de Halloween" (BL) and "Valentine’s Day El Dia del Amor y la Amistad" (BL) books in her Celebrate! series. She is the author of "Test Day, Team Player" (Danielle Losos illustrator) and the illustrator of "Epiphany" (author Bonnie Kirk). In addition to her children\'s books, Shannon (Shannon Moore) is the author of a collection of 3 books of her photography images; "Soulful Collage Imagery The North Carolina Collection", "Soulful Collage Imagery 2 The Alaska Collection ", and "Soulful Collage Imagery 3 The New Mexico Collection". This set of books are intended to be cut up and used in personal collage art projects. She is the author of "Lean in: Hidden Tales in Trees" and co author of the "Love, Lina Journal" as well as co author of "The Mail Art Stories Project: Mail Art in the Time of Covid 19". You can see those books on her Shannon Fitzgerald author page. She lives in Hillsborough North Carolina, with her amazingly supportive husband, her uniquely radiant daughter and their big orange tabby cat Pumpkin, where she lives each day in gratitude for all the wonderful bits that make up her life. You can find her blog about The Intersection of her life and art at www.boldmovesstudio.com']}
